name: Drowsiness-detection-using-python-and-opencv
tagline: A project on Drowsiness detection : Counts the number of blinks in a particular time window, if it exceeds the pre-set limit, a buzzer (Windows Beep Sound) goes off.
body:
#Drowsiness detection
---
##Dependencies:
1. Python 2.x
2. OpenCV.

####I did most of the work on WinPython virtual environment.

####If you find any difficulty, feel free to mail me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
